page.title: 17ATTITUDES OF THREE LADIES.
page.content: We olso asked these questions to the lady who moved to Eyam in 1984. {1. why did you move to Eyam? {2. What attracted you about the area?} These are the the answers we got from the lady that has lived in Eyam all her life. {1. It would be an advantage to have a {drama group or a quoir and more {entertainment. {2.Yes i was born here . There,s been a {lot of changers but i still love it, {though there,s a few too many {visiters. {3. Yes because i,m a real villager. {The only thing that dos,nt intrest me {is politics. I,m intrested in {everything that goes on in the village {from bingo to football. {4. No definitely i would not wish to {live elsewhere. {5. I have lived here all my life. }
